mapper.sql: a.id id, a.username username, a.password password, a.nickname nickname, a.gender gender, a.age age, a.create_time createTime, a.login_time loginTime, a.ip ip
mapper.update: update sys_users a set a.login_time = #{loginTime},a.ip = #{ip} where a.id = #{id}
update sys_users set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_users a ORDER BY a.id asc
SELECT FROM sys_users a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM sys_users a WHERE a.nickname = #{nickname}
